title: Please critique my own business card
content:
Ok here its is, my personal business card.  
Fire away!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516124529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/B_Card_Final_3598.jpg)
author: Typedog

comments.content: I like the type treatment for "guerrizmo," I think for the smaller type something more neutral might be a good contrast. The icon reminds me of the American Lung Association.

Thanks for the input, here is a revised version

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516124529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/B_Card_Final_5534.jpg)
